I wanted to love these and at first I did. They’re a great material, very soft, and super flattering. The only downside at first was there’s no pockets. But after 3 washes and less than a month of having them, the seam completely came undone in the leg. I had already ordered 2 more pair in different colors so I was hoping it was just a mistake in the stitching in that one pair. Well. Now all 3 have holes from the stitching coming undone. I tried delicate bags and washing on gentle settings but nothing saved them. I would say save your money and invest in different brand.

These are the best quality leggings I’ve ever owned. They are so soft, held up with washing, give you the right amount of comforting support on your tummy and made your body look great.
